lemma matchs_reorder: "\<turnstile> fps [:] fTs \<Rightarrow> \<Delta> \<Longrightarrow> \<forall>(l, U)\<in>set fTs. \<exists>u. fs\<langle>l\<rangle>\<^sub>? = \<lfloor>u\<rfloor> \<Longrightarrow> \<turnstile> fps [\<rhd>] fs \<Rightarrow> ts \<Longrightarrow> \<turnstile> fps [\<rhd>] map (\<lambda>(l, T). (l, the (fs\<langle>l\<rangle>\<^sub>?))) fTs \<Rightarrow> ts"
